location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has two holes in the text.

mods.abstract: Reports the sighting of five vessels of the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] near Bushire and news from Shiraz including the death of Carim Caun's [Karim Khan] second son Rahim Caun. The letter also states that monthly accounts for August are enclosed and discusses sales of cloth and woolens.
